  • Element
com.tibco.tea.agent.annotations

Annotation Type TeaParam


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=PARAMETER)
public @interface TeaParam

    Annotation for the parameter of the operation. All operation parameters have to be annotated with TeaParam or KeyParam annotation.

    See Also:
    TeaOperation

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String name
      name of the argument

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String alias
      Set alias name for the TeaParam.
      String defaultValue
      Set default value for the TeaParam.
      String description
      description of the argument
      String developerNotes
      Developer notes
      com.tibco.tea.agent.internal.types.AgentParamUsage usage
      Set the usage for the TeaParam.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract String name
        name of the argument

      • defaultValue

        public abstract String defaultValue
        Set default value for the TeaParam. The TeaParam is optional if a default value is present. All client user interfaces will use the default value if the user does not supply the parameter value. Samples for required and optional TeaParam: 1. Required
        Returns:
        the default value
        Default:
        "AGENT_DEFAULT_VALUE"

      • description

        public abstract String description
        description of the argument
        Default:
        ""

      • developerNotes

        public abstract String developerNotes
        Developer notes
        Returns:
        Default:
        ""

      • alias

        public abstract String alias
        Set alias name for the TeaParam. An alias allows a shell user to use either the name or the alias equivalently for a named parameter, as a convenience. Samples for how to define named only and positional only TeaParam: 1. Named parameter: in this case the 'username' and 'u' is used as the alias name:
        Returns:
        the alias name
        Default:
        "ALIAS_DEFAULT_VALUE"

      • usage

        public abstract com.tibco.tea.agent.internal.types.AgentParamUsage usage
        Set the usage for the TeaParam. See AgentParamUsage
        Returns:
        Default:
        com.tibco.tea.agent.internal.types.AgentParamUsage.LEGACY
